# Douglas Cox

![](https://www.aumsville.us/sites/g/files/vyhlif13391/files/styles/directory_listings_body_with_photo/public/media/citycouncil/image/86/councilor_cox_2024.png?itok=MI0fu52S "councilor_cox_2024.png")

Position

Council President

Phone Number

503-749-2030

Email

[Email](https://www.aumsville.us/email-contact/node/9054/field_email "Email Douglas Cox (opens in a new window)")

Profile

**Current term:** 2/13/2023 - 12/31/2026 (Appointed by Council)  
**First appointed as City Councilor:** 2/13/2023

**Additional roles:** Council President (appointed 1/13/2025), Marion County Public Safety Coordinating (MCPSCC) Representative, Salem-Keizer Area Transportation (SKATS) Commissioner Alternate

 

[Print](https://www.aumsville.us/print/pdf/node/9054)
